onclick.condition: !Player.HasVideo + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.DBID) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m3u) | String.Contains(ListItem.Icon,fla) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,wma) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,ac3) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mp2) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,dts) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,aac) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mp3) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m4a) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,wav) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,ogg)]

!Player.HasVideo + String.IsEmpty(ListItem.DBID) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mov) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,strm) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mts) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,wmv) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,vob) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mpg) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,hevc) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m2v) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mpeg) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m4v) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,avi) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,ts) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,iso) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mkv) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m2ts) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mp4)]

include.name: ExtrasIconAudio
include.visible: String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,wma) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,aac) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mp3) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,m4a) | String.Contains(ListItem.Icon,fla) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,wav) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,ogg) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,ac3) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,mp2) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Icon,dts)
